scripts.bundle: mkdir -p build && npx tsc && npx closure-compiler --rewrite_polyfills false --language_out ECMASCRIPT5 --warning_level QUIET --process_common_js_modules --dependency_mode=STRICT --use_types_for_optimization --module_resolution=NODE --entry_point='tmp/index.js' --js='node_modules/jquery/package.json' --js='node_modules/jquery/**/*.js' --js tmp/index.js | npx uglify-js -o build/index.min.js
scripts.release: npm-run-all build tampermonkey && cp build/already-seen.user.js dist/
